full_summary:
================================
### Title: Vista Clearing – Canada/US Border

### Reference Number: cb-898-67564353

#### Dates
* **Published:** 2023-11-03
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-01-26, 14:00:00 (UTC)
* **Amendment Date**: 2024-01-26

#### Procurement Details
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Not Applicable
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

#### Product/Service Categories
* **UNSPSC**: 10152000, 70111507, 70151500
    + *Tree and shrub seeds and cuttings*
    + *Removal services or ornamental plant or bush or tree*
    + *Forestry management*

#### Contracting Entity
* **Contracting Entity Name**: Natural Resources Canada
* **Contact Information**:
    + Name: [Brenda Harlow]
    + Email: brenda.harlow@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca
    + Phone: 9999999

#### Tender Description
The contract is for Supply Arrangements to provide border clearing services to maintain a 6.1 meters (20 feet) wide vista clear of trees and brush between Canada and the United States.

#### Attachments
[PDF documents can be found here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23954/nrcan-5000073014-rfsa.pdf)
(https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23954/nrcan-5000073014-qa-qr-1_0_0.pdf)

Note: The language, formatting, and structure have been adjusted to make it more professional and readable. I have not changed any technical or factual information.
